verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2607>Hanani<s%> against <S%H1201>Baasha,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"Because I <S%H7311>exalted<s%> you out of the <S%H6083>dust,<s%> and <S%H5414>made<s%> you <S%H5057>prince<s%> over my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and you have <S%H3212>walked<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam,<s%> and have made my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H2398>sin,<s%> to provoke me to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with their <S%H2403>sins;<s%>

<S%H1197>behold,<s%> I will utterly sweep away <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> and <S%H310>his<s%> <S%H1004>house;<s%> and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> your <S%H1004>house<s%> like the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat.<s%>

The <S%H3611>dogs<s%> will <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1201>Baasha<s%>'s descendants who <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H5892>city;<s%> and he who <S%H4191>dies<s%> of his in the <S%H7704>field<s%> the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky<s%> will <S%H398>eat.<s%>"

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H1201>Baasha,<s%> and what he <S%H6213>did,<s%> and his <S%H1369>might,<s%> <S%H3789>aren't<s%> they written in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>
<S%H1201>Baasha<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in <S%H8656>Tirzah;<s%> and <S%H425>Elah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>

Moreover <S%H3027>by<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2607>Hanani<s%> came the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> against <S%H1201>Baasha,<s%> and against his <S%H1004>house,<s%> both because of all the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that he <S%H6213>did<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to provoke him to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with the <S%H4639>work<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands,<s%> in being like the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam,<s%> and because he struck <S%H5221>him.<s%>

In the <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H8337>sixth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H425>Elah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> began to <S%H4427>reign<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in <S%H8656>Tirzah<s%> for two <S%H8141>years.<s%>

His <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H2174>Zimri,<s%> <S%H8269>captain<s%> of <S%H4276>half<s%> his <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> <S%H7194>conspired<s%> against <S%H8656>him.<s%> Now he was in Tirzah, <S%H8354>drinking<s%> himself <S%H7910>drunk<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H777>Arza,<s%> who was over the <S%H1004>household<s%> in <S%H8656>Tirzah:<s%>

and <S%H2174>Zimri<s%> went <S%H935>in<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H4191>him,<s%> and killed <S%H6242>him,<s%> in the twenty - <S%H7651>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and reigned in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>

It <S%H4427>happened,<s%> when he began to reign, as soon as he <S%H3427>sat<s%> on his <S%H3678>throne,<s%> that he <S%H5221>struck<s%> all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1201>Baasha:<s%> he <S%H7604>didn't<s%> leave him a single one who <S%H8366>urinates<s%> on a <S%H7023>wall,<s%> neither of his <S%H1350>relatives,<s%> nor of his <S%H7453>friends.<s%>

Thus <S%H2174>Zimri<s%> <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1201>Baasha,<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> which he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> against <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%>

for all the <S%H2403>sins<s%> of <S%H1201>Baasha,<s%> and the <S%H2403>sins<s%> of <S%H425>Elah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> which they <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> and with which they made <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H2398>sin,<s%> to provoke <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with their <S%H1892>vanities.<s%>

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H425>Elah,<s%> and all that he <S%H6213>did,<s%> <S%H3789>aren't<s%> they written in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>

In the <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H7651>seventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H2174>Zimri<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> in <S%H8656>Tirzah.<s%> Now the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H2583>encamped<s%> against <S%H1405>Gibbethon,<s%> which belonged to the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

The <S%H5971>people<s%> who were <S%H2583>encamped<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H2174>Zimri<s%> has <S%H7194>conspired,<s%> and has also <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H4428>king:<s%> therefore all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> made <S%H6018>Omri,<s%> the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H6635>army,<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>
<S%H6018>Omri<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H1405>Gibbethon,<s%> and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with <S%H6696>him,<s%> and they besieged <S%H8656>Tirzah.<s%>

It <S%H2174>happened,<s%> when Zimri <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H3920>taken,<s%> that he <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H759>castle<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H8313>burnt<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> over him with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H4191>died,<s%>

for his <S%H2403>sins<s%> which he <S%H2398>sinned<s%> in <S%H6213>doing<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> in <S%H3212>walking<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam,<s%> and in his <S%H2403>sin<s%> which he <S%H6213>did,<s%> to make <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H2398>sin.<s%>

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H2174>Zimri,<s%> and his <S%H7195>treason<s%> that he <S%H7194>committed,<s%> <S%H3789>aren't<s%> they written in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>

Then were the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2505>divided<s%> into two <S%H2677>parts:<s%> <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1961>followed<s%> <S%H8402>Tibni<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1527>Ginath,<s%> to make him <S%H4427>king;<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> <S%H6018>Omri.<s%>

But the <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H310>followed<s%> <S%H6018>Omri<s%> <S%H2388>prevailed<s%> <S%H854>against<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H310>followed<s%> <S%H8402>Tibni<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1527>Ginath:<s%> so <S%H8402>Tibni<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and <S%H6018>Omri<s%> <S%H4427>reigned.<s%>

In the <S%H7970>thirty<s%> - <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H6018>Omri<s%> began to <S%H4427>reign<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%> He <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H8656>Tirzah.<s%>

He <S%H7069>bought<s%> the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> of <S%H8106>Shemer<s%> for two <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H3701>silver;<s%> and he <S%H1129>built<s%> on the <S%H2022>hill,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> which he <S%H1129>built,<s%> after the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H8106>Shemer,<s%> the <S%H113>owner<s%> of the <S%H2022>hill,<s%> <S%H8111>Samaria.<s%>
<S%H6018>Omri<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and dealt wickedly <S%H7489>above<s%> all who were before <S%H6440>him.<s%>

For he <S%H3212>walked<s%> in all the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat,<s%> and in his <S%H2403>sins<s%> with which he made <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H2398>sin,<s%> to provoke <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with their <S%H1892>vanities.<s%>

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H6018>Omri<s%> which he <S%H6213>did,<s%> and his <S%H1369>might<s%> that he <S%H6213>showed,<s%> <S%H3789>aren't<s%> they written in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H1697>chronicles<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>
So <S%H6018>Omri<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in <S%H8111>Samaria;<s%> and <S%H256>Ahab<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>

In the <S%H7970>thirty<s%> - <S%H8083>eighth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> began <S%H256>Ahab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6018>Omri<s%> to <S%H4427>reign<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and <S%H256>Ahab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6018>Omri<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

<S%H256>Ahab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6018>Omri<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> above all that were before <S%H6440>him.<s%>

It <S%H7043>happened,<s%> as if it had been a light thing for him to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in the <S%H2403>sins<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat,<s%> that he <S%H3947>took<s%> as <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H856>Ethbaal<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6722>Sidonians,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> and worshiped <S%H7812>him.<s%>
He reared <S%H6965>up<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> for <S%H1168>Baal<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> which he had <S%H1129>built<s%> in <S%H8111>Samaria.<s%>

<S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H842>Asherah;<s%> and <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> yet <S%H3254>more<s%> to provoke <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H3707>anger<s%> than all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> who were before <S%H6440>him.<s%>

In his <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H2419>Hiel<s%> the <S%H1017>Bethelite<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H3405>Jericho:<s%> he laid its <S%H3245>foundation<s%> with the loss of <S%H48>Abiram<s%> his <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> and set <S%H5324>up<s%> its <S%H1817>gates<s%> with the loss of his <S%H6810>youngest<s%> son <S%H7687>Segub,<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> which he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun.<s%>
